name: Welcome to HtCRU tees
description: Barn Bocock aka HtCRU (How to Carve Roast Unicorn) is a designer and vigilante sidekick from Wellington, New Zealand. He spends way too much time in front of his PC when he should be outside running with scissors or playing with fire. HtCRU tees is a small family venture into the wider world of online clothes shopping. Barn works closely with his partner in crime Catherine aka, well, Catherine who is in charge of sewing on tags, ironing and keeping him from trying to wear all the products at the same time. As you can see in the side photos, they also have a clan of small (but friendly) monsters and a unicorn working hard in the stores sweatshop ;-p Their aim is to make high quality tees and other apparel that they themselves want to wear and so hopefully others will also. Please help by spreading the word :) © Copyright 2013 Barn Bocock & HtCRU tees. All Rights Reserved. By the Power of Grayskull!

name: Info panel
description: This store uses New Zealand Dollars ($NZD) for all its prices. To check international exchange rates and get accurate currency conversions click here for XE.com or visit any other major finance site. Any other questions, get in touch with us via the Contact form. © Copyright 2013 Barn Bocock & HtCRU tees. All Rights Reserved. By the Power of Grayskull!

name: CLEARANCE SPECIAL “Brand Wars: Sith Overlord” - Black hoody in men's 2XL ONLY
description: Clearance Special $10 NZD off. Only x1 left! “THROUGH STRENGTH, I GAIN POWER.” A very limited & unique run of 5 men's 2XL heavy weight hoodies. This hoody features an embroidered grey/silver “Brand Wars” emblem on the front, with the main grey/silver (hint of lilac) design positioned strategically on the back below the hood in its down state. Our other regular hoodies are 350 GSM in weight (80% Cotton & 20% Poly) but these, which we nicknamed our “Overlord” hoodies, are a heavy 500 GSM (95% Cotton & 5% Poly)! They also have the meanest looking metal double zipper and some tough external stitching detail. Able to withstand the cold void of space and deflect glancing blaster fire* only the most powerful and larger Sith Lords need bother to purchase these. * In my mind ;-) Sizing:Sizing: (Refresh page if not showing below) Price of $65 NZD on 1st August 2013 ≈ | $57 AUD | $51 USD | $53 CAD | £33 GBP | €38 EUR | NB: If a particular size isn’t showing then it's currently not available for this range or colour choice. If a product size says it's "Sold Out" then email us to request a reprint in that size via the Contact form.

name: CLEARANCE SPECIAL “SOLO POLO” - Cool Rider 80
description: Clearance Special $4 NZD off. Only x3 left! Han Lauren or Ralph Solo, you decide! ;-) SOLO POLO's feature an embroidered chest icon and side sleeve print of "80 SOLO POLO" ("Empire" year and product branding). • 230 GSM, 100% cotton pique • Shoulder to shoulder tape • Tonal buttons to match shirt colour • Contoured collar & rib sleeve bands Various sizes available in the following unisex combinations: • Navy Blue polo with "copper" coloured print & embroidery. • Graphite Grey polo with "ice" coloured print & embroidery. Please check and measure your clothing size carefully as the polo shirts are slightly different in width & length compared to the 5001 & 4001 tees, eg I wear a Men's M 5001 tee but I nicely fit the S polo (even with it being slightly shorter in length). name: Affiliate store Teapot tees
description: Teapot tees is our online kids apparel store specialising in bold designs with quirky characters and themes that will appeal to the adults buying and washing them just as much as the kids that wear them. Fun, affordable quality. Check it out now at: www.teapottees.com
